name: Cult Master
description:
Cult Master is a game made for ludum dare 44 compo. An event where you make a game from scratch in 48 about a theme. In this case "Your life is your currency".
Hence the time constraint you may expierience unfinished features/bugs.

In Cult Master you are the leader of your cult. Your goal is to grow the population of your cult big as possible. You do this by building houses for them to live in and by buying food. To obtain gold to buy these you must sacrifice members of your cult on the altar. When you have no members left, Game Over!

Controls:

A/D: move left/right
SCROLL WHEEL: zoom in/out
Mouse: used to drag members of your cult and to buy food and houses from the store.
